description.value: Once per day, your familiar can use 2 actions with the concentrate trait to give up some of its animating energy and heal you. It must be in your space to do so. You restore a number of Hit Points equal to [[/r max(floor(@actor.level/2)d8, 1d8)]]{1d8 times half your level} (minimum 1d8).

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Grand Bazaar
